solution_line_template: The cost of Dale's toast is {dale_toast_slices} × ${cost_per_slice_toast} = ${<<{dale_toast_slices}*{cost_per_slice_toast}={cost_dale_toast}>>}{cost_dale_toast}.
The cost of Andrew's toast is {andrew_toast_slices} × ${cost_per_slice_toast} = ${<<{andrew_toast_slices}*{cost_per_slice_toast}={cost_andrew_toast}>>}{cost_andrew_toast}.
The cost of Dale's eggs is {dale_eggs} × ${cost_per_egg} = ${<<{dale_eggs}*{cost_per_egg}={cost_dale_eggs}>>}{cost_dale_eggs}.
The cost of Andrew's eggs is {andrew_eggs} × ${cost_per_egg} = ${<<{andrew_eggs}*{cost_per_egg}={cost_andrew_eggs}>>}{cost_andrew_eggs}.
